meanings.definition: Call together for a meeting or assembly.
meanings.sent1: The mayor is convoking all citizens for a town hall meeting.
meanings.sent2: She convokes her friends for a study group every weekend.
meanings.sent3: Convoking her stuffed animals for a tea party always brings a smile to her face.
meanings.sent4: The sound of the bell convoking the students echoed through the school halls.
meanings.sent5: Convoking the Avengers to save the world from destruction, Iron Man took charge.

meanings.definition: Summon or gather people for a specific purpose.
meanings.sent1: The coach is convoking the team for a strategy session before the big game.
meanings.sent2: The king convokes his advisors to discuss matters of the kingdom.
meanings.sent3: Convoking the cats for a fashion show seemed like a hilarious idea.
meanings.sent4: The music festival convoked music lovers from all over the country.
meanings.sent5: Convoking the superheroes to fight the evil villain, Captain America led the charge.
